subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray is seeking his first Grand Slam championship and full-fledged membership into an exclusive club that has been dominated by Roger Federer, Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal.
snippet: Andy Murray is seeking his first Grand Slam championship and full-fledged membership into an exclusive club that has been dominated by Roger Federer, Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal.
